name: 2D Platformer (illia_d)
description:
2D Platformer. 
1. Added 3 complete levels
2. Levels are tied together, with a logical progression - from easy to more challenging. 
3. Modified the menus a little. 
4. Each level brings something unique, harder obstacles or harder enemies. 
5. Changed the background for the main menu

Created by Illia
